title: Does this layout look decent?

embed.description: Main content will consist of- Indie games- I like to play Indie games and try and help promote good games. As such, I might get interested in an Indie game p...

body:
Just wanna know if the layout looks -Not shit-.
I know the banner could use more work. (Im working on a waaaay better one)
My Photoshop kinda broke so I had to use stupid ass GIMP.

plz don't watch the vids as they are bad, and im only here to see what people think of the layout.
(That and there really shit)

replies.body:
Im just gonna assume the Thumbs up mean "It doesn't look shit, so GJ I guess".
Well, Umm thank you... I guess?
